definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: Our creed has always been that business is business.
sentences.chinese: 我们的信条一直是公私分明。

sentences.english: Loyalty and bravery are near-sacred tenets in Wookiee society.
sentences.chinese: 在伍基人的社会中，忠诚和勇敢是近乎神圣的信条。

sentences.english: This is one of the main beliefs of the non-profit group GlobalGiving.
sentences.chinese: 这就是非盈利团体“环宇奉献”的主要信条之一。

sentences.english: The earliest version of this credo of the Freemasons , dates back to 1400.
sentences.chinese: 共济会的这种信条的最早版本可追溯到1400年。

sentences.english: Ben Mattes of Ubisoft shows an upcoming version of Assassin's Creed.
sentences.chinese: 本育碧马茨显示了刺客的信条即将推出的版本。

sentences.english: The party's new philosophies are little more than their old beliefs writ large.
sentences.chinese: 这个政党的新指道原则无非是其老信条的阐发。

sentences.english: This is the mantra to try to avoid overengineering simple features.
sentences.chinese: 这是避免过度设计简单功能的信条。

sentences.english: By this time, there is no longer a threat of death for discussing the society's beliefs.
sentences.chinese: 此时，已不会因讨论该社团的信条而招致杀身之祸。

sentences.english: I make bold to say that violence is the creed of no religion....
sentences.chinese: 我可以大胆的说暴力是无信仰者的信条。

sentences.english: It was a  creed written into the founding documents that declared the  destiny of a nation.
sentences.chinese: 它是写进开国宪章的信条，宣示了这个国家的命运。

sentences.english: It is a doctrine they bring, and one must subscribe to it.
sentences.chinese: 它们带来了一种信条，而每一个人都必须服从于它。
这是柏朗亚高永远的信条。

sentences.english: People who use the principles say they work.
sentences.chinese: 践行了这些信条的人们都说管用。

sentences.english: C2.05 This congregation accepts the Unaltered Augsburg Confession as a true witness to the Gospel.
sentences.chinese: 本堂会接受不更改的奥斯堡信条是福音的真实见证。

sentences.english: Do you think there's any merit in these tenets?
sentences.chinese: 你认为这些信条有任何功劳吗？

sentences.english: Another word for dogma is values, and another word for politics is democracy.
sentences.chinese: 信条也就是价值标准，而政冶则是指民主。
